00146 
00150 template<class T>
00151 class PxSerializerDefaultAdapter : public PxSerializer
00152 {
00153 public:
00154 
00155     /************************************************************************************************/
00156 
00160 
00161     PxSerializerDefaultAdapter(const char* name) : mTypeName(name){}
00162 
00163     virtual const char* getConcreteTypeName() const
00164     { 
00165         return mTypeName; 
00166     }
00167     
00168     virtual void requiresObjects(PxBase& obj, PxProcessPxBaseCallback& c) const
00169     {
00170         T& t = static_cast<T&>(obj);
00171         t.requiresObjects(c);
00172     }
00173 
00174     virtual bool isSubordinate() const
00175     {
00176         return false;
00177     }
00178         
00180     /************************************************************************************************/
00181 
00185 
00186     // object methods
00187 
00188     virtual void exportExtraData(PxBase& obj, PxSerializationContext& s) const
00189     { 
00190         T& t = static_cast<T&>(obj);
00191         t.exportExtraData(s);
00192     }
00193 
00194     virtual void exportData(PxBase& obj, PxSerializationContext& s) const
00195     {
00196         PxAllocatorCallback& allocator = PxGetFoundation().getAllocatorCallback();
00197         T* copy = reinterpret_cast<T*>(allocator.allocate(sizeof(T), "TmpAllocExportData", __FILE__, __LINE__));
00198         PxMemCopy(copy, &obj, sizeof(T));
00199         copy->preExportDataReset();
00200         s.writeData(copy, sizeof(T));
00201         allocator.deallocate(copy);
00202     }
00203 
00204     virtual void registerReferences(PxBase& obj, PxSerializationContext& s) const
00205     {
00206         T& t = static_cast<T&>(obj);
00207 
00208         s.registerReference(obj, PX_SERIAL_REF_KIND_PXBASE, size_t(&obj));
00209 
00210         struct RequiresCallback : public PxProcessPxBaseCallback
00211         {
00212             RequiresCallback(PxSerializationContext& c) : context(c) {}
00213             RequiresCallback& operator=(RequiresCallback&) { PX_ASSERT(0); return *this; }
00214             void process(physx::PxBase& base)
00215             {               
00216                 context.registerReference(base, PX_SERIAL_REF_KIND_PXBASE, size_t(&base));
00217             }
00218             PxSerializationContext& context;
00219         };
00220 
00221         RequiresCallback callback(s);
00222         t.requiresObjects(callback);
00223     }
00224 
00225     // class methods
00226 
00227     virtual size_t getClassSize() const
00228     {
00229         return sizeof(T);
00230     }
00231 
00232     virtual PxBase* createObject(PxU8*& address, PxDeserializationContext& context) const
00233     {
00234         return T::createObject(address, context);
00235     }
00236 
00237 
00239     /************************************************************************************************/
00240 
00241 private:
00242     const char*    mTypeName;   
00243 };
00244 
00250 #define PX_NEW_SERIALIZER_ADAPTER(x) \
00251     *new( PxGetFoundation().getAllocatorCallback().allocate(sizeof(PxSerializerDefaultAdapter<x>), \
00252     "PxSerializerDefaultAdapter",  __FILE__, __LINE__ )) PxSerializerDefaultAdapter<x>(#x)
00253 
00257 #define PX_DELETE_SERIALIZER_ADAPTER(x) \
00258     { PxSerializer* s = x; if (s) { s->~PxSerializer(); PxGetFoundation().getAllocatorCallback().deallocate(s); } }
00259
